targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${start_location:singlequote} = 'none' OR ${destination_location:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No start or destination location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT
  latitude,
  longitude
FROM locations
WHERE
  uid = ${start_location:singlequote}
UNION
SELECT
  latitude,
  longitude
FROM locations
WHERE
  uid = ${destination_location:singlequote}

SELECT
  latitude,
  longitude,
  COALESCE("display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', name, amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', road, house_number), '')), neighbourhood, city, postcode, country)) AS "Location"
FROM locations
WHERE
  uid = ${start_location:singlequote}

SELECT
  latitude,
  longitude,
  COALESCE("display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', name, amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', road, house_number), '')), neighbourhood, city, postcode, country)) AS "Location"
FROM locations
WHERE
  uid = ${destination_location:singlequote}

panels.description: Details of the trips. On some cars not all data is provided and thus sections may remain empty.

targets.rawSql:
CREATE extension IF NOT EXISTS cube;
CREATE extension IF NOT EXISTS earthdistance;

DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${start_location:singlequote} = 'none' OR ${destination_location:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No start or destination location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS "Number of trips",
  MAX("Distance") AS "Distance",
  MIN("Length") AS "Minimum length",
  percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY "Length") AS "Median length",
  MAX("Length") AS "Maximum length",
  SUM("Length") AS "Total length",
  MIN("Duration") AS "Minimum duration",
  percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY "Duration") AS "Median duration",
  stddev_samp("Duration") AS "Std. dev. duration",
  MAX("Duration") AS "Maximum duration",
  SUM("Duration") AS "Total duration"
FROM
(SELECT
  id AS "id",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM("destination_date"-"start_date")) AS "Duration",
  (point(start_locations.longitude, start_locations.latitude)<@>point(destination_location.longitude, destination_location.latitude)) * 1.609344 AS "Distance",
  "destination_odometer"-"start_odometer" AS "Length"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_uid" = start_locations.uid
LEFT JOIN locations destination_location ON trips."destination_location_uid" = destination_location.uid
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("start_date") OR $__timeFilter("destination_date")) AND
  start_location_uid = ${start_location:singlequote} AND
  destination_location_uid = ${destination_location:singlequote} AND
  vin = '$VIN') AS tripdata

panels.title: Details

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${start_location:singlequote} = 'none' OR ${destination_location:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No start or destination location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM("destination_date"-"start_date")) AS "Duration"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_uid" = start_locations.uid
LEFT JOIN locations destination_location ON trips."destination_location_uid" = destination_location.uid
LEFT JOIN trips_tags ON trips.id = trips_tags.trips_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("start_date") OR $__timeFilter("destination_date")) AND
  start_location_uid = ${start_location:singlequote} AND
  destination_location_uid = ${destination_location:singlequote} AND
  vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC

panels.description: List of all trips between start and destination recorded. Not all attributes can be filled automatically. If you want to make additions or changes use the ⚙ button at the end of each row.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${start_location:singlequote} = 'none' OR ${destination_location:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No start or destination location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT
  "start_date" AS "Start Date",
  EXTRACT('epoch' FROM("destination_date"-"start_date")) AS "Duration",
  ("destination_odometer"-"start_odometer") AS "Length",
  "destination_odometer" AS "Odometer",
  '⚙' AS "Edit",
  id,
  COALESCE((round(extract(epoch FROM "start_date") - 300) * 1000)::TEXT,'now-1d') AS start_date_ts,
  COALESCE((round(extract(epoch FROM "destination_date") + 300) * 1000)::TEXT,'now') AS end_date_ts
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_uid" = start_locations.uid
LEFT JOIN locations destination_location ON trips."destination_location_uid" = destination_location.uid
LEFT JOIN trips_tags ON trips.id = trips_tags.trips_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("start_date") OR $__timeFilter("destination_date")) AND
  start_location_uid = ${start_location:singlequote} AND
  destination_location_uid = ${destination_location:singlequote} AND
  vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
ORDER BY 1 DESC

panels.title: Trips on this route

panels.description:
Distribution of the trip occurrences over the day.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number of trips were recorded. Change timezone in vehicle settings.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${start_location:singlequote} = 'none' OR ${destination_location:singlequote} = 'none'THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No start or destination location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (("start_date" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AT TIME ZONE COALESCE('UTC', 'UTC')))
  + (ROUND((EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM "start_date")/30)::numeric)/2) AS "Hour",
 (SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM("destination_date"-"start_date"))) / CAST( SUM(SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM("destination_date"-"start_date")))) over () as FLOAT) * 100) AS "Percentage of Trips",
 ROUND((SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM("destination_date"-"start_date"))) / CAST( SUM(SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM("destination_date"-"start_date")))) over () as FLOAT) * 100))::TEXT || '% of total time on this route' AS "Text"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_uid" = start_locations.uid
LEFT JOIN locations destination_location ON trips."destination_location_uid" = destination_location.uid
LEFT JOIN trips_tags ON trips.id = trips_tags.trips_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("start_date") OR $__timeFilter("destination_date")) AND
  start_location_uid = ${start_location:singlequote} AND
  destination_location_uid = ${destination_location:singlequote} AND
  trips.vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY "Hour"
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Hourly distribution in timezone $car_timezone

panels.description:
Duration of the trip occurrences over the day.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number of trips were recorded. Change timezone in vehicle settings.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${start_location:singlequote} = 'none' OR ${destination_location:singlequote} = 'none'THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No start or destination location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
  EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (("start_date" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AT TIME ZONE COALESCE('UTC', 'UTC')))
  + (ROUND(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM "start_date" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')/10)/6) AS "Hour",
  MAX(extract('epoch' from "destination_date"-"start_date")) AS "Maximum",
  AVG(extract('epoch' from "destination_date"-"start_date")) AS "Average",
  MIN(extract('epoch' from "destination_date"-"start_date")) AS "Minimum",
  COUNT(*) AS "Samples",
  'Based on ' || COUNT(*) || ' samples' AS "Max. Text"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_uid" = start_locations.uid
LEFT JOIN locations destination_location ON trips."destination_location_uid" = destination_location.uid
LEFT JOIN trips_tags ON trips.id = trips_tags.trips_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("start_date") OR $__timeFilter("destination_date")) AND
  start_location_uid = ${start_location:singlequote} AND
  destination_location_uid = ${destination_location:singlequote} AND
  trips.vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY "Hour"
ORDER BY 1) AS result
WHERE
  "Samples" > 1

panels.title: Duration by time in timezone $car_timezone

panels.description: Start of the trip. If no data is shown your car does not provide location information.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${start_location:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No start location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT
  locations.name AS "Name",
  locations.amenity AS "Amenity",
  (locations.road || COALESCE(' '||locations.house_number, '')) AS "Street",
  locations.neighbourhood AS "Neighbourhood",
  locations.postcode AS "Postcode",
  locations.city AS "City",
  locations.state AS "State",
  locations.country AS "Country",
  locations.source AS "Source"
FROM locations
WHERE
  uid = ${start_location:singlequote}

panels.title: Start Location

panels.description: End of the trip. If no data is shown your car does not provide location information.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${destination_location:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No destination location was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Trips dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;

SELECT
  locations.name AS "Name",
  locations.amenity AS "Amenity",
  (locations.road || COALESCE(' '||locations.house_number, '')) AS "Street",
  locations.neighbourhood AS "Neighbourhood",
  locations.postcode AS "Postcode",
  locations.city AS "City",
  locations.state AS "State",
  locations.country AS "Country",
  locations.source AS "Source"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations on trips.destination_location_uid = locations.uid
WHERE
  uid = ${destination_location:singlequote}

panels.title: Destination Location

list.description: Select Car if you have multiple cars in your account
list.label: Car
list.name: VIN

list.definition:
SELECT
   "start_location_uid" || ':' || COALESCE(start_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', start_locations.name, start_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', start_locations.road, start_locations.house_number), '')), start_locations.neighbourhood, start_locations.city, start_locations.postcode, start_locations.country)) AS "Start Location"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_uid" = start_locations.uid
WHERE "start_location_uid" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY COALESCE(start_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', start_locations.name, start_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', start_locations.road, start_locations.house_number), '')), start_locations.neighbourhood, start_locations.city, start_locations.postcode, start_locations.country))
list.label: Start
list.name: start_location
list.query:
SELECT
   "start_location_uid" || ':' || COALESCE(start_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', start_locations.name, start_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', start_locations.road, start_locations.house_number), '')), start_locations.neighbourhood, start_locations.city, start_locations.postcode, start_locations.country)) AS "Start Location"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_uid" = start_locations.uid
WHERE "start_location_uid" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY COALESCE(start_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', start_locations.name, start_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', start_locations.road, start_locations.house_number), '')), start_locations.neighbourhood, start_locations.city, start_locations.postcode, start_locations.country))

list.definition:
SELECT
   "destination_location_uid" || ':' || COALESCE(destination_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', destination_locations.name, destination_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', destination_locations.road, destination_locations.house_number), '')), destination_locations.neighbourhood, destination_locations.city, destination_locations.postcode, destination_locations.country)) AS "Destination Location"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations destination_locations ON trips."destination_location_uid" = destination_locations.uid
WHERE "destination_location_uid" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY COALESCE(destination_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', destination_locations.name, destination_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', destination_locations.road, destination_locations.house_number), '')), destination_locations.neighbourhood, destination_locations.city, destination_locations.postcode, destination_locations.country))
list.label: Destination
list.name: destination_location
list.query:
SELECT
   "destination_location_uid" || ':' || COALESCE(destination_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', destination_locations.name, destination_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', destination_locations.road, destination_locations.house_number), '')), destination_locations.neighbourhood, destination_locations.city, destination_locations.postcode, destination_locations.country)) AS "Destination Location"
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations destination_locations ON trips."destination_location_uid" = destination_locations.uid
WHERE "destination_location_uid" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY COALESCE(destination_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', destination_locations.name, destination_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', destination_locations.road, destination_locations.house_number), '')), destination_locations.neighbourhood, destination_locations.city, destination_locations.postcode, destination_locations.country))
